PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-12482008-06-18,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of STEVE SIMPSON of Burnaby, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designate of STEVE SIMPSON for the British Columbia/Yukon region, as established under subsection 10(1.1) of the Act; and determine that STEVE SIMPSON shall reside within 100 kilometres of the British Columbia/Yukon regional Office, effective June 23, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
